judgment_text:
IN THE HIGH COURT OF BOMBAY AT PANAJI
STAMP NO. 103 OF 2007
IN
COMPANY PETITION NO. 3 OF 1988
M/s. West Coast Foundaries Pvt. Ltd.
......
Petitioners
Official Liquidator present in person.
CORAM:
N. A. BRITTO, J.
DATE:
th January, 2007

.
P.C.
The matter is being adjourned from time to time for the purpose of filing 
the Dissolution Report from 04.08.2006. The Official Liquidator has now filed an 
application dated 12.01.2007, stating that certain procedures are required to be 
followed before the Dissolution Report is filed for which the Official Liquidator 
required permission from this Court to spend certain amounts. The Official 
Liquidator has prayed that an amount of Rs.5,255/- towards publication and 
Rs.2,000/- towards postage, Court fees, etc, is required to be spent. The Official 
Liquidator is permitted to spend the said sum of Rs.5,255/- and Rs.2,000/-, as 
aforesaid. The Official Liquidator assures the Court that the certified list of Creditors 
will be filed within a period of two and half months. 
S.O. after 11 weeks. Application under Stamp No. 103/2007, shall 
stand disposed of.
N. A. BRITTO, J.
